record.meta: @Birgittines of St. Mary, Double convent (Marienwater/Koudewater), Rosmalen$scr$
@Birgittines of St. Mary, Double convent (Marienwater/Koudewater), Rosmalen$pat$
Die @passie ons liefs heeren (long version) / pseudo-Bridget of Sweden
Transported in 1713 from the discontinued monastery Marienwater to Maria-Refugie in Uden
[inc.] Hier beghint dat liden ons lieuen heer Jhesus Christus alsoe hijt seluevr gheopenbaert heuet sijnder lieuven bruyt sinte brigita onser weerdigher moeder..
Sander Olsen 1977, no. 4 - Sander Olsen 1995, no. 235 - Stooker & Verbeij 1997, no. 1077 - Sander Olsen 2002, p. 54
Probably written in the monastery Marienwater (Koudewater) in Rosmalen (f.1r: Birgitta "onser weerdigher moeder" - f.152r: S. Lambertus "patroon"). Owned by the same monastery
